Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are rerouted via 111th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th over regular route: due to, street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Headline: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near State/Randolph
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/Randolph due to festival near State/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/Randolph due to festival near State/Randolph.

Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp. buses will operate via Ida B. Wells, State, Adams, LaSalle, North Ave., Lake Shore Drive and over regular route.

Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp. buses will operate via LaSalle, Washington, Clark, Monroe, Dearborn, Washington, Michigan and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
